iamchloer: So absolutely happy for you. When I published my first book, #PCDHasNothingOnMe all the emotions that I was feeling I couldn’t put into words so all I did was cry. The road that led me to writing my book was one that was so personal and the thought that my thoughts (my book is a small excerpt from my personal journals as a kid living with PCD a rare genetic lung disease) were going to be out in the world 🌎 was scary, exciting, joyful, peaceful, overwhelming and so many other emotions. So @elainewelteroth you are one of my biggest (s)heroes and I don’t only feel your caption but I love it. Can’t wait to read your book. Blessings and much continued success always. You are, we are #MoreThanEnough 🙌🏻💯🔥🤗😘🎉
